Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller
  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for Tab Pane. Sets up Tab Pane with 4 tabs. Tests Multimedia Control. Injects other controllers. Sets up database credentials.
    Author:
    Haley Yerxa

      • reverseString

        public static java.lang.String reverseString​(java.lang.String pw)
        Reverse the order of a string recursively. Developed by consulting the following tutorial: https://beginnersbook.com/2017/09/java-program-to-reverse-a-string-using-recursion/
        Parameters:
        pw - given string, in this program used for password.
        Returns:
        String reversed
